class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 3 students only.
course_description: This course is designed to integrate the clinical nursing, pathophysiology, and pharmacology content from previous classes addressing situations involving multi-system and complex health challenges. The focus of this course is on the nursing management of acutely ill and injured clients.
sections: Class Nbr: 6382, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: TTh 3-6p, Instructor: Csaky/Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
